property.name: Text
property.value: If The Kindly Man would be killed, instead attach him to your House card as your only agenda with the text: 'Response: After you win an Intrigue or Power challenge, choose a non-unique character in any dead or discard pile and put it into play under your control. At the end of the phase, discard that character if it is still in play. (Limit once per phase.)'

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Stark only. Deadly.

property.name: House
property.value: Greyjoy. Stark.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attached character gains the Traitor trait and the text: 'If you do not win dominance, discard this character from play.' Response: After Turncloak comes out of Shadows during the challenges phase, attach it to an opponent's character.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Greyjoy or House Stark only.

property.name: House
property.value: Stark. Targaryen.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win a Military challenge, choose a character of STR 2 or less controlled by the losing player. Attach Ward to the chosen character as a Condition attachment with the text: 'Take control of attached character. If the owner of attached character wins an Intrigue or Power challenge against you, discard Ward.'

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Stark or House Targaryen only.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Traitor. Fool.

property.name: Text
property.value: Discard Hugor Hill from play if you control Tyrion Lannister. If you win a challenge in which Hugor Hill attacked alone, choose a character in the losing opponent's discard pile with a cost of X or lower. Put that character into play underr your control. X is the ammount by which you won the challenge.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Lord. Knight.

property.name: Text
property.value: If Ser Kevan Lannister would be killed, instead attach him to your House Card as you only agenda with the text: 'Response: After you win an Intrigue challenge as the attacker, choose and kneel a character.'

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Lannister only. Stealth.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: Discard 1 power from a Lannister character you control to cancel a triggered effect that chooses that character as its only target. Then, draw a card.

property.name: Traits
property.value: King. Lord.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Stannis Baratheon is the only King character in play, he gainst vigilant, renown, and stealth.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Immune to location abilities.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Knight. Bastard.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win a challenge in which The Bastard of Nightsong participated, move 1 power from the losing opponent's House card to The Bastard of Nightsong.

property.name: Traits
property.value: House Tyrell. Lord. Ally.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Willas Tyrell is participating in a challenge against an opponent running an agenda, he gains renown. While WIllas Tyrell is participating in a challenge, participating Lannister and Martell characters do not count their STR.

property.name: Text
property.value: If Aeron Damphair would be killed, instead attach him to your House card as your only agenda with the text: 'Response: After a Greyjoy character is saved, draw 2 cards.'

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Greyjoy only. Stealth.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: Kill Maester Kerwin (cannot be saved) to cancel any effect that chooses 1 of your Ironborn characters as its only target.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attached character gainst deadly. Response: After a character dies for deadly, attached character claims 1 power.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Choose a Martell character. Until the end of the phase that character gainst stealth and 'Immune to triggered effects.'

property.name: Text
property.value: Attached character gets -1 STR. Response: After Harried by Dragons is played from your hand, search your deck for a card named Harried by Dragons and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Targaryen only. Ambush.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Kneel 1 influence to choose a character and name a Trait. Until the end of the phase, that character gets -X STR and is killed if its STR is 0. X is the number of Targaryen characters you control with the named Trait.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Targaryen only.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Ally. Lord.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After a character enters play during the challenges phase, choose a non-unique character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets -1STR and is killed is its STR is 0.

property.name: House
property.value: Stark. Lannister. Baratheon. Greyjoy. Targaryen. Martell.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Free Cities. Kingdom.

property.name: Text
property.value: Lower the cost of the first out-of-House Greyjoy card you play each round by 1. Lower the cost of the first Mercenary character you play each round by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, discard the top card of each opponent's deck. Then, if this is your revealed plot card, trigger the 'when revealed' effect of the top River plot card in your used pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, reveal the top card of your deck and put it into your hand. Then, if this is your revealed plot card, trigger the 'when revealed' effect of the top River plot card in your used pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, each player chooses a card in play which he or she controls and puts the chosen card on top of its owner's deck. Then, if this is your revealed plot card, trigger the 'when revealed' effect of the top River plot card in your used pile.

property.name: Traits
property.value: House Bolton.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Damon Dance-For-Me is participating in a challenge against an opponent running an agenda, he gains deadly and stealth. If you are not running an agenda, Damon Dance-For-Me gains renown.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Immune to events.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Kneel a Direwolf to stand Bran Stark. Then, Bran Stark gains (choose 1): a Military icon, stealth, or deadly until the end of phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a location you control. Attached location is immune to non-plot card effects. While you are the defending player, non-unique characters lose stealth and deadly.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Stark only.

property.name: ErrataText
property.value: Should read: Attached location is immune to other non-plot card effects. (The attached location does not gain immunity to Castle Battlements.)

property.name: Traits
property.value: Ally. Fool.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Kneel Penny to choose a character without attachments. The controller of that character chooses to either kneel that character or choose and discard 1 card from his or her hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Merchant's Widow gets +1 STR for each gold token on it. Response: After an opponent returns gold to the treasury during the taxation phase, add 1 gold from the treasury to Merchant's Widow.

property.name: Text
property.value: If Shireen Baratheon would be killed, instead attach her to your House Card as your only agenda with the text: 'Response: After you win a Power challenge, choose a character you control with renown. Until the end of the phase, when that character claims power for renown, it claims 1 additional power.'

property.value: House Baratheon only.

property.value: Response: After you win dominance, Dragonstone Bannerman claims 1 power.

property.name: Text
property.value: Victarion Greyjoy gets +1 STR for each knelt Warship location you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: Kneel Moqorro to save a unique Greyjoy character from being killed or discarded. That character gets +2 STR and gains intimidate until the end of the phase.

property.value: If Quentyn Martell would be killed, instead attach Quentyn Martell to your House card as your only agenda with the text: 'Unique Martell characters you control gaint vengeful. Response: After 1 or more characters stand for vengeful, draw 1 card.'

property.value: House Martell only. Stealth.

property.value: Baratheon. Martell.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you lose a challenge as the attacker, stand Spiteful Bastard. Response: After you win a challenge as the defender, stand Spiteful Bastard.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Kneel X influence to choose a non-unique Mercenary or Ally character in your dead or discard pile and put that character into play. X is the printed cost of that character.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Targaryen only.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Young Griff comes out of Shadows, stand any number of characters you control. Then, you may immediately bring another card out of Shadows by paying the rest of its gold cost.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Targaryen only. Stealth.

property.name: Text
property.value: Strong Belwas gets -1 STR for each gold token on him and is killed if his STR is 0. Response: Place 1 gold token from the treasury on Strong Belwas to save another unique Targaryen character from being killed or discarded from play. (Limit once per phase.)

property.value: No attachments except Boon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Lower the cost of the first out-of-House Martell card you play each round by 1. Lower the cost of the first Lord character you play each round by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, each player returns the top character in his or her dead pile to the top of his or her deck. Then, if this is your revealed plot card, trigger the 'when revealed' effect of the top River plot card in your used pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, add 2 gold from the treasury to your gold pool. Then, if this is your revealed plot card, trigger the 'when revealed' effect of any River plot card in your used pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, each opponent chooses and discards 1 card from his or her hand, if able. Then, if this is your revealed plot card, trigger the 'when revealed' effect of the top River plot card in your used pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, name a challenge type. In order to declare any characters to attack or defend during challenges of that type, a player must declare all of his or her eligible characters. Then, if this is your revealed plot card, trigger the 'when revealed' effect of the top River card in your used pile.

property.name: ErrataText
property.value: 'When revealed, name a challenge type. In order to declare an characters to attack or defend during challenges of that type, a player must declare all of his or her eligible character.' is considered part of the 'When revealed' effect and is active while that plot is revealed or when the 'When revealed' effect has been triggered by another River plot card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Characters with stalwart gain stealth. Response: After you play a character with the stalwart keyword from your hand, choose and stand a Stark character.

property.value: Ally. Wildling.

property.name: Text
property.value: If Abel's Washerwoman is attacking and all of your participating characters have the Wildling trait, she gains: 'Response: After the defending player declares no defenders, claim 1 power for your House.'

property.name: Text
property.value: While Yezzan's Grotesquerie is participating in a challenge, characters with a Military icon do not count their STR.

property.name: Text

property.value: If Follower of Two Gods would be killed, instead put it on the bottom of your deck. Response: After you win an unopposed challenge, Follower of Two Gods gains a Power icon until the end of the phase.

property.value: Dominance: Return Thrall from your dead pile to your hand. Use this ability only if there are at least 3 characters in your dead pile.

If you win a challenge in which Victarion's Reavers attacked alone, instead of the normal claim effects, the losing player chooses and discards X locations he or she controls from play. X is the printed claim on your revealed plot card.

property.value: Raider and Captain characters you control do not kneel to attack or defend during the first challenge initiated each round.

property.name: Text

property.value: Should read: House Targaryen only. If Griff would be killed, instead attach him to your House Card as your only agenda with the text: 'If you control fewer attachments than each opponent, unattach Griff and return him to play.' Response: After a Targaryen attachment you control is discarded from play, kneel 1 influenece to return it to your hand instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may spend gold tokens on Martell characters you control as if they are in your gold pool. Response: After you kneel Old Bill Bone as an attacker or defender, discard the top card of your deck. If that card is not a character, place 1 gold token from the treasury on Old Bill Bone.

Response: After you lose a challenge as the attacker, choose and stand a participating character.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Martell only.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After an opponent's character's STR is reduced to 0, The Brazen Beasts claim 1 power. (Limit once per phase.)

property.name: Traits
property.value: The East.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Kneel Meereenese Fighting Pit to choose and stand a Dragon character or a character with 1 or more Weapon attachments.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attached character gains deadly. Challenges: Kneel attached character to have it participate as an attacker in the current challenge.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may play this card during any response window. Response: Until the end of the phase, players cannot play any additional responses. (Cannot be canceled.)

property.name: Text
property.value: After you announce House of Dreams as your agenda, choose from your deck a unique, in-House, non-limited location. That location starts the game in play and gains the text: 'Immune to opponents' non-plot card effects.' Draw 6 cards for your setup hand. You cannot spend more than 3 gold during setup.

property.name: Text
property.value: Players must declare 2 or more characters to attack or defend in a challenge.
